buttonDefaultTitle.description: Hover on the Talkie button, dynamically set.
buttonDefaultTitle.message: Karanta zaɓin rubutu da ƙarfi tare da $NAME$
buttonDefaultTitle.original: Read text selection out loud with $NAME$

buttonDefaultTitle_Static.description: Hover on the Talkie button, set from manifest.json.
buttonDefaultTitle_Static.message: Karanta zaɓin rubutu da ƙarfi tare da Talkie
buttonDefaultTitle_Static.original: Read text selection out loud with Talkie

commandSpeakClipboardDescription.message: Yi magana da rubutu daga allo

extensionDescription.description: For the browsers/web stores. Maximum 132 characters.
extensionDescription.message: Mai sauri & sauƙi rubutu-zuwa-magana. Karanta da ƙarfi daga gidajen yanar gizo, PDF, imel. Sirri-sane, buɗe lambar tushe.
extensionDescription.original: Fast & easy text-to-speech. Read aloud from websites, PDF, email. Privacy-aware, open source code.

frontend_PopupUsageShort.message: Zaɓi rubutun da ake so akan kowane shafin yanar gizon kuma danna Talkie a cikin kayan aikin burauzan ku.
frontend_PopupUsageShort.original: Select desired text on any web page and click the Talkie button in your browser toolbar.

frontend_aboutIssuesOnGithubLinkText.message: Buƙatun fasali da rahoton bugu akan Github
frontend_aboutIssuesOnGithubLinkText.original: Feature requests and bug reports on Github

frontend_faq001A.message: Muryoyin sun fito daga duka daga tsarin aiki (Windows, ChromeOS, macOS, Linux, da dai sauransu) da kuma mai binciken ku na yanzu (Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Firefox, da sauransu). Wannan kuma yana nufin cewa zaku iya zazzagewa da shigar da kowane muryoyin da kuke son samu, sake kunna kwamfutarku, kuma Talkie yakamata ya gane su ta atomatik. Hakanan zaka iya gwada amfani da wani mai bincike daban, saboda tallafin murya na iya bambanta koda akan tsari iri ɗaya ne.
frontend_faq001A.original: The voices come from both from the operating system (Windows, ChromeOS, macOS, Linux, etcetera) and your current browser (Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Firefox, etcetera). This also means that you can download and install any voices you would like to have, reboot your computer, and Talkie should recognize them automatically. You can also try using a different browser, as voice support may differ even on the same system.

frontend_faq001Q.message: Ta yaya Talkie gano shigar muryoyin?
frontend_faq001Q.original: How does Talkie detect installed voices?

frontend_faq002A.message: Kuna iya ƙara ƙarin muryoyi daga Microsoft da sauransu. Mafi sauƙi shine ƙara sabon harshe a cikin saitunan tsarin. Tabbatar cewa kun shigar da muryar don harshen. Duba umarnin shigarwa daban.
frontend_faq002A.original: You can add more voices from both Microsoft and others. The easiest is to add a new language in the system settings. Make sure you also install the voice for the language. See separate installation instructions.

frontend_faq002Q.message: Ta yaya zan iya shigar da ƙarin muryoyi a cikin Talkie akan Microsoft Windows?
frontend_faq002Q.original: How can I install more voices in Talkie on Microsoft Windows?

frontend_faq003A.message: Kuna iya shigar da ƙarin muryoyi da harshe cikin sauƙi a cikin saitunan tsarin. Hakanan ana iya samun muryoyin ChromeOS a cikin Shagon Yanar Gizon Chrome.
frontend_faq003A.original: You can easily install additional voices and language in the system settings. Voices for ChromeOS may also be available in the Chrome Web Store.

frontend_faq003Q.message: Ta yaya zan iya shigar da ƙarin muryoyi a cikin Talkie akan Google ChromeOS?
frontend_faq003Q.original: How can I install more voices in Talkie on Google ChromeOS?

frontend_faq004A.message: Ana iya shigar da ƙarin muryoyin cikin sauƙi daga zaɓin tsarin macOS don magana. Duba umarnin shigarwa daban.
frontend_faq004A.original: Additional voices can be easily installed from the macOS system preferences for speech. See separate installation instructions.

frontend_faq004Q.message: Ta yaya zan iya shigar da ƙarin muryoyi a cikin Talkie akan Apple macOS?
frontend_faq004Q.original: How can I install more voices in Talkie on Apple macOS?

frontend_faq005A.message: Ya dogara da wane tsarin rarraba Linux, mai bincike, da tsarin rarraba fakiti kuke amfani da su. Duba umarnin shigarwa daban don haɗin software ɗin ku. Mafi sauƙi zai iya zama gwada wani mai bincike kuma duba ko yana da murya mai dacewa da aka riga aka shigar. Misali, Firefox v130 akan Ubuntu 24.04 da aka shigar ta amfani da Snap ya haɗa da muryoyin eSpeak 13000+ da ke ba da damar harsuna 100+ a cikin yarukan 100+ — amma duk waɗannan muryoyin ba su da inganci. Idan aka kwatanta, Google Chrome v129 akan Ubuntu 24.04 da aka shigar ta amfani da Apt ya haɗa da muryoyin 19 waɗanda ke ba da damar harsuna 14 a cikin yarukan 18 — duk suna da inganci.
frontend_faq005A.original: It depends on which Linux distribution, browser, and package distribution system you use. See separate installation instructions for your combination of software. The easiest might be to try another browser and see if it has a suitable voice preinstalled. For example, Firefox v130 on Ubuntu 24.04 installed using Snap includes 13000+ eSpeak voices enabling 100+ languages in 100+ dialects — but all these voices are of low quality. In comparison, Google Chrome v129 on Ubuntu 24.04 installed using Apt includes 19 voices enabling 14 languages in 18 dialects — all with high quality.

frontend_faq005Q.message: Ta yaya zan iya shigar da ƙarin muryoyi a cikin Talkie akan Linux?
frontend_faq005Q.original: How can I install more voices in Talkie on Linux?

frontend_faq006A.message: E kuma a'a. Talkie baya hada da wasu muryoyi a cikin kanta, amma yana amfani da muryoyin da aka riga aka shigar akan kwamfutarka. Kuna iya shigar da kowane ƙarin muryoyin da kuke so.
frontend_faq006A.original: Yes and no. Talkie does not include any voices in itself, but uses the voices which are already installed on your computer. You can install any additional voices you would like.

frontend_faq006Q.message: Za a iya ƙara tallafi don <sabuwar murya> a cikin Talkie ?
frontend_faq006Q.original: Can you add support for <a new voice> in Talkie?

frontend_faq007A.message: E kuma a'a. Kamar yadda Talkie amfani da muryoyin da aka sanya akan kwamfutarka, kuna buƙatar shigar da sabuwar murya wacce ke goyan bayan yaren da kuke son amfani da shi.
frontend_faq007A.original: Yes and no. As Talkie uses the voices which are installed on your computer, you need to install a new voice which supports the language you would like to use.

frontend_faq007Q.message: Za a iya ƙara tallafi don <a sabon Talkie a cikin Talkie ?
frontend_faq007Q.original: Can you add support for <a new language> in Talkie?

frontend_faq008A.message: Ee, idan an shigar da muryoyin kuma suna kan layi. Kuna iya gani a cikin jerin muryoyin da aka yiwa alama akan layi.
frontend_faq008A.original: Yes, if the voices installed are also available offline. You can see in the list of voices which are marked as online.

frontend_faq009A.message: A'a, Talkie Premium yana da daidaitattun muryoyi kamar Talkie. Kuna iya shigar da ƙarin muryoyin akan tsarin ku, kuma ana samun su daidai. A cikin Talkie Premium kuna iya tsara muryar da aka fi so kowane harshe da yare ko da yake.
frontend_faq009A.original: No, Talkie Premium has the exact same voices as Talkie. You can install more voices on your system, and they are equally available. In Talkie Premium you are able to customize the preferred voice per language and dialect though.

frontend_faq009Q.message: Shin Talkie Premium yana da ƙarin muryoyi fiye da Talkie ?
frontend_faq009Q.original: Does Talkie Premium have more voices than Talkie?

frontend_faq010A.message: Google Chrome (kuma mai yiwuwa wasu Chromium tushen bincike) sun yi wannan batun/kwaro tun a kalla shekara ta 2014. Talkie yana da wasu workarounds a wurin, da kuma wani zaɓi don taimaka/nakasa karatu da rubutu a cikin gajeriyar sassa. Zan ci gaba da inganta aikin, amma har sai ƙungiyar Chromium ba ta aiki 100%. Idan kun fuskanci wannan batu, da fatan za a sanar da ni wanne ne mai bincike da sigar, tsarin aiki da siga, da harshe/murya kuke amfani da su.
frontend_faq010A.original: Google Chrome (and presumably other Chromium based browsers) have had this issue/bug since at least year 2014. Talkie has some workarounds in place, and an option to enable/disable reading text in shorter parts. I will continue to improve the workaround, but until the Chromium team works it might not work 100%. If you experience this issue, please let me know which browser and version, operating system and version, and language/voice you are using.

frontend_faq010Q.message: Me yasa Talkie daina karantawa bayan kalmomi 20-30 ko dakika kadan?
frontend_faq010Q.original: Why does Talkie stop reading after 20-30 words or a few seconds?

frontend_faq011A.message: Akwai dalilai guda biyu. Da fari dai, idan muryar mai aiki tana kan layi yana buƙatar zazzage fayil ɗin magana kafin kunna ta. Wannan yana nufin ƙarin dakatarwa wanda ya danganta da saurin haɗin Intanet ɗin ku. Kuna iya bincika muryoyin da ke kan layi a cikin jerin muryoyin. Dalili na biyu shi ne, hanyar da za a bi don yin magana da dogon rubutu yana yanke rubutu a cikin guntun sassa, yawanci kowace jumla ko kowane sashe. Wannan na iya ƙara ƙarin ɗan hutu ga kowane ɗan dakata. Kuna iya ba da damar karanta dogayen rubutu a matsayin ɓangare ɗaya a cikin zaɓuɓɓukan, wanda yakamata ya cire dakatarwa akan tsarin tallafi.
frontend_faq011A.original: There are two reasons. Firstly, if the active voice is online it needs to download the speech file before playing it. This means an added pause which is depending on your internet connection speed. You can check which voices are online in the list of voices. The second reason is that the workaround for speaking long texts chops up the text in shorter parts, usually per sentence or per clause. This can add an extra pause for each pause. You can enable reading long texts as one part in the options, which should remove the pause on supported systems.

frontend_faq011Q.message: Me yasa Talkie wani lokaci yana da tsayin daka tsakanin jimloli da kalmomi?
frontend_faq011Q.original: Why does Talkie sometime have a long pause between sentences and words?

frontend_faq012A.message: Abin takaici, ba cikakke ba. Ga masu amfani da Talkie Premium yana yiwuwa a kwafi rubutu, kuma a yi magana da shi daga allon allo. Sai ya zama cewa Google Docs (da Google Spreadsheet, Google Drive, da makamantansu) ba gidan yanar gizo ba ne, amma “application in the browser” ne na musamman da Google ya kirkira. Talkie ba zai iya isa ga rubutun da aka zaɓa ba, ko ƙara abubuwan menu na mahallin, don haka maɓallin Talkie baya aiki.
frontend_faq012A.original: Unfortunately, not fully. For Talkie Premium users it is possible to copy text, and speak it from the clipboard. It turns out that Google Docs (as well as Google Spreadsheet, Google Drive, and similar) is not a website, but a special "application in the browser" created by Google. Talkie cannot access the selected text, nor add context menu items, so the Talkie button does not work.

frontend_faq012Q.message: Shin Talkie aiki a cikin Google Docs?
frontend_faq012Q.original: Does Talkie work in Google Docs?

frontend_faq013A.message: Ee, don Allah. Zai fi dacewa ƙirƙirar rahoto kan Github, don haka wasu su iya taimakawa. Da fatan za a haɗa bayanai da yawa gwargwadon yuwuwa, kamar wanne mai bincike da siga, tsarin aiki da sigar, da harshe/murya da kuke amfani da su. Hakanan haɗa bayanai game da takamaiman rukunin yanar gizon da kuke ganin kwaro, zai fi dacewa tare da hanyar haɗi.
frontend_faq013A.original: Yes, please. Preferably create an issue report on Github, so others can help out as well. Please include as much information as possible, such as which browser and version, operating system and version, and language/voice you are using. Also include information regarding specific websites where you see the bug, preferably with a link.

frontend_faq013Q.message: Shin zan ba da rahoton kwari?

frontend_faq014A.message: Ee, mafi yawan lokuta. Idan za ku iya zaɓar rubutun a cikin PDF, danna kan shi dama kuma zaɓi Talkie a cikin menu. Talkie Premium masu amfani kuma za su iya kwafi rubutun, sannan karanta shi daga allo. Idan ba za a iya zaɓar rubutun ba, kamar idan ɓangaren hoto ne, to ba zai yi aiki ba.
frontend_faq014A.original: Yes, most of the time. If you can select the text in the PDF, right click on it and choose Talkie in the menu. Talkie Premium users can also copy the text, then read it from the clipboard. If the text cannot be selected, such as if it is part of an image, then it will not work.

frontend_faq014Q.message: Za a iya Talkie karanta fayilolin PDF?

frontend_faq015A.message: A'a. Talkie yana da amfani mara iyaka — kuna iya karanta adadin kalmomi da tsayin rubutu gwargwadon yadda kuke so.
frontend_faq015A.original: No. Talkie has unlimited usage — you can read as many words and as long texts as you like.

frontend_faq015Q.message: Shin Talkie yana da iyakacin kalma?
frontend_faq015Q.original: Does Talkie have a word limit?

frontend_faq016A.message: Ee. Bayyana fasalin da kuke so a cikin sabon fitowar akan Github.
frontend_faq016A.original: Yes. Describe your desired feature in a new issue on Github.

frontend_faq017A.message: Akwai editan gajerun hanyoyin Allon madannai, wanda zaku iya samu a kasan shafin Extensions a cikin Google Chrome.
frontend_faq017A.original: There is a Keyboard shortcuts editor, which you can find at the bottom of the Extensions page in Google Chrome.

frontend_faq017Q.message: Yadda za a canza gajerun maɓallan a cikin Google Chrome?
frontend_faq017Q.original: How to change shortcut keys in Google Chrome?

frontend_faq018A.message: Kuna iya canza ko cire maɓallan gajerun hanyoyin a cikin saitunan Firefox don Ƙara-kan. Danna maɓallin cogwheel don nemo editan maɓallin gajeriyar hanya.
frontend_faq018A.original: You can change or remove shortcut keys in Firefox settings for Add-Ons. Click the cogwheel button to find the shortcut key editor.

frontend_faq018Q.message: Yadda za a canza gajerun hanyoyi a Firefox?
frontend_faq018Q.original: How to change shortcut keys in Firefox?

frontend_faq019A.message: Ee, ana godiya koyaushe taimako. Da fatan za a duba shafin aikin don umarni.
frontend_faq019A.original: Yes, help is always appreciated. Please see the project page for instructions.

frontend_faq020A.message: Ee — da fatan za a gaya wa abokanku game da Talkie. Wataƙila aika hanyar haɗi zuwa shahararren intanet da kuka fi so, rukunin kan layi, ko wasiƙar labarai. Za ka iya har ma ka nemi shugabanka ya saka ta a kan dukkan kwamfutocin da ke wurin aiki, ko kuma malaminka ya sanya ta a makaranta. Yada kalma game da Talkie yana da matukar godiya.
frontend_faq020A.original: Yes — please tell your friends about Talkie. Perhaps send a link to your favorite internet celebrity, online group, or newsletter. You can even ask your boss to install it on all the computers at work, or your teacher to install it at school. Spreading the word about Talkie is very much appreciated.

frontend_faq020Q.message: Zan iya taimakawa Talkie wata hanya dabam?
frontend_faq020Q.original: Can I help Talkie in any other way?

frontend_faq021A.message: Yana ɗaukar lokaci mai yawa da ƙoƙari don haɓakawa da kula da Talkie — ɗaruruwan awoyi ya zuwa yanzu. Duk da haka, Talkie kyauta ne don kowa ya yi amfani da shi gwargwadon abin da yake so. Don ƙarin tallafi na kuɗi Talkie haɓakawa, kulawa da kiyaye Talkie kyauta, wasu fasalulluka suna samuwa ga masu amfani da Talkie Premium
frontend_faq021A.original: It takes quite a lot of time and effort to develop and maintain Talkie — hundreds of hours so far. Yet, Talkie is free for everyone to use as much as they like. To financially support further both development, maintenance and keeping the free Talkie free, some features are only available to Talkie Premium users.

frontend_faq021Q.message: Me yasa akwai bugu biyu na Talkie ?
frontend_faq021Q.original: Why are there two editions of Talkie?

frontend_faq022A.message: Ee, akwai zaɓuɓɓukan gudummawa da yawa akwai.
frontend_faq022A.original: Yes, there are multiple donation options available.

frontend_faq022Q.message: Zan iya ba da gudummawa ta amfani da PayPal, canja wurin banki, da dai sauransu?
frontend_faq022Q.original: Can I donate using PayPal, bank transfer, etcetera?

frontend_faq023A.message: Ee, idan kun ba da gudummawa ta amfani da PayPal wanda ke ba da sauƙin sarrafa kuɗi. Ba a samun mayar da kuɗi gabaɗaya don wasu hanyoyin bayar da gudummawa saboda yawan ƙarin aikin da yake buƙata, ban da haɗari kamar mayar da kuɗi zuwa asusun da bai dace ba. Yana da kyau masu amfani su fara amfani da lokaci don gwada Talkie Premium , don tabbatar da cewa komai ya gamsar kafin bayarwa.
frontend_faq023A.original: Yes, if you donated using PayPal which offers simple refund management. Refunds are generally not available for other methods of donations due to the amount of extra work it requires, in addition to risks such as refunding to the wrong account. It is preferable that users first spend time trying out Talkie Premium, to ensure everything is satisfactory before donating.

frontend_faq024A.message: Tabbas, babu matsala. Kawai kunna haɓaka Talkie Premium don gwada shi.
frontend_faq024A.original: Sure, no problem. Just enable the Talkie Premium upgrade to try it out.

frontend_faq024Q.message: Zan iya gwada Talkie Premium kyauta?
frontend_faq024Q.original: Can I try out Talkie Premium for free?

frontend_faq025A.message: Babu tallace-tallace, tarin bayanai, ko bin diddigin mai amfani a cikin Talkie. Masu amfani masu farin ciki suna ba da gudummawa don Talkie Premium shine kawai samun kuɗi.
frontend_faq025A.original: There is no advertisement, data collection, or user tracking in Talkie. Happy users donating for Talkie Premium is the only monetization.

frontend_faq025Q.message: Shin abubuwan Talkie sun ƙunshi talla, tattara bayanai, ko masu amfani da waƙa?
frontend_faq025Q.original: Does the Talkie extensions contain advertisement, collect data, or track users?

frontend_faq026A.message: Tsarin girmamawa shine lokacin da mutane suka amince da juna don bin ƙa'idodin da aka amince da su, ba tare da tsauraran matakan bincike ba. Don Talkie Premium wannan yana nufin amincewa cewa waɗanda suka haɓaka suma sun ba da gudummawa.
frontend_faq026A.original: The honor system is when individuals trust each other to adhere to agreed upon guidelines, without strictly enforced checks. For Talkie Premium this means trusting that those who upgrade have also donated.

frontend_faq027A.message: Domin mutane a duk faɗin duniya suna amfani da kuɗaɗe daban-daban, suna da matakan samun kudin shiga daban-daban, kuma suna da matakan godiya daban-daban don abubuwan Talkie Premium. Babu guda ɗaya, ƙayyadaddun farashin da ke aiki da kyau ga kowa a duniya. A saman wannan ya zo da sauyi a cikin agogo, yanayin sake zagayowar tattalin arziki, bambancin yanki/cikin ƙasa, da sauransu. Gabaɗaya, farashin saituna don samfurin da aka sayar a duk duniya yana da rikitarwa. Yana da sauƙi a bar kowa ya saita farashin kansa, kuma tabbatar da cewa samfurin ya isa ya ba da garantin gudummawa.
frontend_faq027A.original: Because people around the world use different currencies, have different levels of disposable income, and have different levels of appreciation for Talkie Premium's features. There is no single, fixed price that works well for everyone in the world. On top of that comes fluctuations in currencies, economic cycle trends, regional/intra-country variations, etcetera. All in all, settings prices for a product sold worldwide is complicated. It is easier to let everyone set their own price, and ensure that the product is good enough to warrant a donation.

frontend_faq027Q.message: Me yasa zan iya saita farashin kaina?
frontend_faq027Q.original: Why can I set my own price?

frontend_faq028A.message: Tun da ban san adadin kuɗin da za ku iya ba kuma kuna son kashewa akan software na rubutu-zuwa-magana, na fi son ku ba da gudummawar abin da kuke tunanin Talkie Premium ya dace a gare ku — ba, ba kaɗan ba. Idan kuna neman tsarin tunani, lokacin da Shagon Yanar Gizon Google Chrome ya aiwatar da biyan kuɗi na Talkie Premium (2017-2021) farashin biyan kuɗi na shekara shine $$25 (Dalar Amurka) a cikin Amurka ta Amurka. Farashin duniya ya bambanta ko da yake, kamar yadda Google ke daidaita farashin ta atomatik ga wasu ƙasashe da agogo.
frontend_faq028A.original: Since I don't know how much money you are able and willing to spend on text-to-speech software, I prefer that you donate what you think Talkie Premium is worth to you — no more, no less. In case you are looking for a frame of reference, when Google Chrome Web Store handled payments for Talkie Premium (2017-2021) the yearly subscription cost was $$25 (US Dollar) in the United States of America. Worldwide prices varied though, as Google automatically adjusted prices for other countries and currencies.

frontend_faq028Q.message: Nawa kuke ba da shawarar in ba da gudummawa?
frontend_faq028Q.original: How much do you recommend I donate?

frontend_faq029A.message: Domin aiwatar da tsarin biyan kuɗi da tabbatarwa yana ɗaukar lokaci mai yawa da ƙoƙari. Ana tsammanin cewa farashin aiwatar da tsauraran matakan tabbatar da biyan kuɗi ya fi asarar da aka samu daga daidaikun mutane na yaudarar tsarin. Tabbatar da biyan kuɗi yana buƙatar wasu matakan tattara bayanai daga tsarin masu amfani, kuma ƙwararrun masu amfani za su iya yin aiki akai-akai akan tabbatarwa ta wata hanya. Don haka daga hangen nesa na fasaha da kasuwanci, kodayake babu tabbacin, yana da sauƙin amincewa kawai cewa masu amfani suna bin tsarin girmamawa.
frontend_faq029A.original: Because implementing a system for payments and verification takes a lot of time and effort. It is assumed that the cost of implementing strict payment verification is higher than the losses from individuals cheating the system. Payment verification also requires some level of data collection from users' systems, and technically skilled users can often work around the verification anyways. So from a technical and business perspective, even though there are no guarantees, it is easier to simply trust that users adhere to the honor system.

frontend_faq029Q.message: Me yasa babu gudummawa ko tabbacin biyan kuɗi?
frontend_faq029Q.original: Why is there no donation or payment verification?

frontend_faq030A.message: Na gane cewa ba da gudummawar "ba komai" yana da ɗan ruɗani. Amsar a takaice ita ce kudi ba komai ba ne. Amsar mai tsayi tana da ƙarin fannoni. Shawarar kin aiwatar da tabbacin biyan kuɗi yana nufin cewa adadin da aka biya bashi da mahimmanci. Bugu da kari, farashin "kera" kwafin dijital na Talkie Premium ba shi da tsada, don haka ba da shi ba don komai ba baya nufin asarar kuɗi ga mai haɓakawa. Har ila yau, akwai fatan cewa idan kuna son Talkie Premium za ku gaya wa abokanku game da shi, kuma watakila wasu daga cikinsu suna ba da gudummawa ta wata hanya ko wata. Ba da Talkie Premium don haka ana iya ganinsa azaman ƙoƙarin talla.
frontend_faq030A.original: I realize that donating "nothing" is a bit confusing. The short answer is that money isn't everything. The long answer has more aspects. The decision to not implement payment verification means that the amount paid is irrelevant. In addition, the cost of "manufacturing" a digital copy of Talkie Premium is zero, so giving it away for nothing does not imply a financial loss for the developer. There is also the hope that if you like Talkie Premium you will tell your friends about it, and perhaps some of them end up donating in one way or another. Giving away Talkie Premium can therefore be seen as a marketing effort.

frontend_faq030Q.message: Me yasa zan iya zaɓar ba da gudummawa ko ba da komai?
frontend_faq030Q.original: Why can I choose to donate or pay nothing?

frontend_faq031A.message: Ee, amma babu wani tsari mai sarrafa kansa don bayar da gudummawa maimaituwa. Hanya mafi sauƙi ita ce kawai ku sake ba da gudummawa a wani lokaci na gaba.
frontend_faq031A.original: Yes, but there is no automated system for recurring donations. The most straightforward way is that you simply donate again at a later time.

frontend_faq031Q.message: Zan iya ba da gudummawa mai maimaitawa kowane wata ko na shekara?
frontend_faq031Q.original: Can I make a recurring monthly or yearly donation?

frontend_faq032A.message: Wannan buƙatu ce da ba kasafai ba, kuma zai buƙaci a sarrafa ta da hannu. Da fatan za a mika hannu kafin bayarwa.
frontend_faq032A.original: This is a rare request, and it would need to be handled manually. Please reach out before donating.

frontend_faq032Q.message: Zan iya samun rasit don gudummawa na?
frontend_faq032Q.original: Can I get a receipt for my donation?

frontend_faq033A.message: Domin kuna son ƙarin abubuwan da Talkie Premium ke bayarwa, da kuma jin daɗin bayar da gudummawa ga buɗe tushen ci gaban software ta masu haɓakawa masu zaman kansu. Saboda tsadar lokaci mai yawa na haɓakawa da kiyayewa, amma farashin sifili na "ƙirƙira" kwafin dijital, gudummawar Talkie Premium kuma ana iya ganin su azaman bayar da tallafi da ƙarfafawa don haɓakawa da kulawa na gaba, sabanin ƙimar samfurin a lokacin. na bayarwa.
frontend_faq033A.original: Because you like the additional features Talkie Premium provides, and the happy feeling of contributing to open source software development by independent developers. Due to relatively high time cost of development and maintenance, but zero cost of "manufacturing" digital copies, donations for Talkie Premium can also be seen as providing support and encouragement for future development and maintenance, as opposed to the value of the product at the time of donation.

frontend_faq033Q.message: Me yasa zan ba da gudummawa don haɓakawa?
frontend_faq033Q.original: Why should I donate to upgrade?

frontend_faq034A.message: Haka ne, amma ya dogara da wanne marufi kake amfani da shi. Akwai duka muryoyin zamani da tsoffin muryoyin da ake samu a Microsoft Windows. Lokacin da na gwada ƙarshe, muryar Dutch "Microsoft Frank" tana cikin Microsoft Edge, amma ba a cikin Google Chrome ko Mozilla Firefox ba. Dalili ɗaya shine an gina wasu muryoyin don sabon tsarin magana na WinRT, wasu kuma don tsohuwar Interface Programming Interface (SAPI). Mai binciken burauzar da kuka fi so bazai goyi bayan tsoho da sabbin tsarin magana ba, ma'ana cewa muryar da aka shigar a zahiri ba za ta iya amfani ba. Bayan lokaci, yawancin masu bincike za su goyi bayan sabon tsarin WinRT. Idan kuna rasa muryoyi a cikin harshenku, shawara ɗaya ita ce gwada amfani da Talkie a cikin Microsoft Edge.
frontend_faq034A.original: Yes, but it depends on which browser you use. There are both modern voices and old voices available in Microsoft Windows. When I last tested, the Dutch voice "Microsoft Frank" was available in Microsoft Edge, but not in Google Chrome nor Mozilla Firefox. One reason is that some voices are built for the newer WinRT speech system, and some for the older Speech Application Programming Interface (SAPI). Your favorite browser may not support both the old and the new speech systems, meaning that a voice which is in fact installed may not be usable. Over time, most browsers will probably support the newer WinRT system. If you are missing voices in your language, one suggestion is to try using Talkie in Microsoft Edge.

frontend_faq034Q.message: Shin duk muryoyin Microsoft Windows suna aiki tare da Talkie ?
frontend_faq034Q.original: Do all voices for Microsoft Windows work with Talkie?

frontend_faq035A.message: Wataƙila, tare da ƙoƙari mai yawa. Har ila yau, akwai wasu hanyoyin da ba na hukuma ba don samun sababbin muryoyin WinRT don yin aiki tare da tsofaffin masu bincike na SAPI, amma wannan fasaha ce ta fasaha kuma ba a ba da shawarar ga masu amfani da fasaha ba.
frontend_faq035A.original: Perhaps, with a lot of effort. There are also some unofficial workarounds to get new WinRT voices to work with older SAPI-enabled browsers, but this is a highly technical endeavor and not recommended for non-technical users.

frontend_faq035Q.message: Za a iya muryoyin WinRT suyi aiki a cikin masu binciken SAPI masu kunnawa akan Microsoft Windows?
frontend_faq035Q.original: Can WinRT voices work in SAPI-enabled browsers on Microsoft Windows?

frontend_faq036A.message: Ee, wasu suna yi. Bi umarnin shigarwa don tsarin ku da mai lilo. Da zarar an shigar da muryoyin a cikin burauzar ku, Talkie ya kamata ya gano su ta atomatik.
frontend_faq036A.original: Yes, some do. Follow the installation instructions for your system and browser. Once the voices are installed in your browser, Talkie should detect them automatically.

frontend_faq036Q.message: Shin buɗaɗɗen muryoyin muryoyin suna aiki tare da Talkie ?
frontend_faq036Q.original: Do open source voices work with Talkie?

frontend_faq037A.message: Taimako na nuna kashe kuɗi na son rai akan wani abu mai kyau. Yi la'akari da shi kamar kyauta. Biyan kuɗi yana nuna ma'amalar kuɗi ta tilas.
frontend_faq037A.original: Donations imply voluntary spending on something positive. Think of it like gratuity. Payments imply a mandatory transaction of money.

frontend_faq038A.message: A madadin kuɗi, yada positivity. Taimakawa ƙungiyar agaji. Ba da agaji a wata sadaka ta gida. Taimaka wa baƙo. Runguma dan uwa. Yi murmushi. A haƙiƙa, duk waɗannan suna da mahimmanci fiye da gudummawar kuɗi don Talkie Premium. Ina jin daɗin karɓar katunan wasiƙa ko da yake.
frontend_faq038A.original: In lieu of money, spread positivity. Support a humanitarian organization. Volunteer at a local charity. Help a stranger. Hug a family member. Smile. In fact, all of these are more important than monetary donations for Talkie Premium. I do appreciate receiving postcards though.

frontend_faq038Q.message: Na zaɓi ba da gudummawar komai. Akwai wani abu kuma da zan iya yi?
frontend_faq038Q.original: I chose to donate nothing. Is there something else I can do?

frontend_faq039A.message: Ee, kuna iya amfani da Talkie Premium ta wata hanya.
frontend_faq039A.original: Yes, you may use Talkie Premium anyways.

frontend_faq039Q.message: Idan na zaɓi ba da gudummawar komai, shin har yanzu ana ƙirgawa?
frontend_faq039Q.original: If I chose to donate nothing, does it still count?

frontend_faq040A.message: Asalin shirin shine don samun kuɗi Talkie ta hanyar cajin kuɗin biyan kuɗi na shekara don Talkie Premium. Tsawon ƴan shekaru (2017-2021) Shagon Yanar Gizon Google Chrome yana kula da biyan kuɗi da biyan kuɗi na Talkie Premium , amma ba sa ba da wannan sabis ɗin. Lokacin da tsarin biyan kuɗi na waje ya daina aiki na zaɓi in ware fasalin Talkie Premium , don nuna cewa ƙoƙari mai yawa ya shiga Talkie. Ba da gudummawa alama ce ta wakilcin da mutane ke amfani da ita kuma suna godiya da Talkie , wanda shine abin da ya ƙarfafa ni in yi ɗaruruwan sa'o'i yin aiki a kai.
frontend_faq040A.original: The original plan was to monetize Talkie by charging a yearly subscription fee for Talkie Premium. For a few years (2017-2021) Google Chrome Web Store handled payments and subscriptions for Talkie Premium, but they no longer offer that service. When the external payment system stopped working I chose to keep Talkie Premium features separate, to indicate that a lot of effort has gone into Talkie. Donations are a proxy-indication that people use and appreciate Talkie, which is what has inspired me to spend hundreds of hours working on it.

frontend_faq040Q.message: Idan gudummawa na zaɓi ne, me yasa Talkie Premium ke bambanta?
frontend_faq040Q.original: If donations are optional, why are Talkie Premium features separate?

frontend_faq041A.message: Talkie , kamar sauran buɗaɗɗen lambar tushe na, aikin sha'awa ne. Yawancin lokaci akwai ƙaramin abu don kulawa kowane ƴan makonni, kamar amsa tambayoyin imel. Shirye-shirye akan Talkie yawanci ana mayar da hankali ne ga ƴan kwanaki anan da can — galibi lokacin hutu da hutu. Abin takaici, canje-canjen manufofin waje suna ɗaukar lokaci da yawa daga haɓaka fasali. Misali, haɓaka Talkie da fasaha ta hanyar fasaha zuwa Siffar Bayyanawa 3 (MV3) ya ɗauki makonni da yawa na aiki (2023-2024) ba tare da bayyananniyar ci gaba ga amfanin Talkie ba.
frontend_faq041A.original: Talkie, like my other open source code, is a hobby project. There is usually something minor to take care of every few weeks, such as replying to emailed questions. Programming on Talkie is usually concentrated to a few days here and there — often during holidays and vacations. Unfortunately, external policy changes take more and more time from feature development. For example, technically upgrading Talkie to Manifest Version 3 (MV3) took several weeks of work (2023-2024) without apparent improvement to Talkie's usefulness.

frontend_faq041Q.message: Nawa lokaci kuke kashewa akan Talkie ?
frontend_faq041Q.original: How much time do you spend working on Talkie?

frontend_faq042A.message: A halin yanzu ban tabbata ba. Na haɓaka Talkie (2016) don wasu su ji daɗi, kuma ban yi amfani da shi da kaina ba. Ƙara sabbin abubuwa da koyan sabbin abubuwa abu ne mai daɗi. Karɓar ra'ayi mai kyau da ganin yawan masu amfani da ke hawa yana da kyau. A halin yanzu ba abin sha'awa ba ne na fi so ko da yake, saboda abubuwan waje sun yi mummunan tasiri ga ci gaba a cikin shekarun da suka gabata (2020-2024). Musamman, buga tsawo na yanar gizo yana buƙatar ci gaba da sabunta manufofin Google Chrome Web Store (CWS) da Mozilla Add-Ons (AMO) don Firefox.
frontend_faq042A.original: At the moment I am not sure. I developed Talkie (2016) for others to enjoy, and do not actually use it myself. Adding new features and learning new stuff is fun. Receiving positive feedback and seeing the number of users going up is nice. It is currently not my favorite hobby though, because external factors have had a negative impact on development during the past years (2020-2024). In particular, publishing a web extension requires staying up to date with the ever-evolving policies of Google Chrome Web Store (CWS) and Mozilla Add-Ons (AMO) for Firefox.

frontend_faq042Q.message: Har yaushe za ku ci gaba da aiki akan Talkie ?
frontend_faq042Q.original: How long will you keep working on Talkie?

frontend_faq043A.message: Amsar wannan tambayar ba za a iya dogara da ita ba. Ziyarci gidan yanar gizon Talkie don halin aikin yanzu.
frontend_faq043A.original: The answer to this question cannot reliably be kept up to date. Visit the Talkie website for the current project status.

frontend_faq043Q.message: Har yanzu kuna aiki tuƙuru akan Talkie ?
frontend_faq043Q.original: Are still you actively working on Talkie?

frontend_featuresEdition_Free.message: A halin yanzu kuna amfani da sigar kyauta ta Talkie , kuma ana samun ƙayyadadden tsarin fasali. Shin kun yi tunanin haɓakawa zuwa Talkie Premium ?
frontend_featuresEdition_Free.original: You are currently using the free edition of Talkie, and a limited set of features is available. Have you considered upgrading to Talkie Premium?

frontend_featuresEdition_Premium.message: A halin yanzu kuna amfani da Talkie Premium , kuma duk fasalulluka suna nan. Na gode sosai, yana sanyaya zuciyata!
frontend_featuresEdition_Premium.original: You are currently using Talkie Premium, and all features are available. Thank you very much, it warms my heart!

frontend_featuresEditions.message: Talkie yana zuwa cikin bugu biyu: Talkie da Talkie Premium. Buga na kyauta yana da kyau ga yawancin lokuta masu amfani, amma bugu na ƙima yana ba da ƙarin zaɓuɓɓuka da fasali.
frontend_featuresEditions.original: Talkie comes in two editions: Talkie and Talkie Premium. The free edition is great for most use cases, but the premium edition offers additional options and features.

frontend_featuresFree_List03.message: Yana karanta rubutun da aka zaɓa ta danna maɓalli, maɓallin gajeriyar hanya, ko menu na danna dama.
frontend_featuresFree_List03.original: Reads selected text by a button click, shortcut key, or right-click menu.

frontend_featuresFree_List04.message: Yana karanta dogayen rubutu da labarai da ƙarfi, koda kuwa shafin yana baya.
frontend_featuresFree_List04.original: Reads long texts and articles out loud, even while the tab is in the background.

frontend_featuresFree_List05.message: Lambar bude tushe ce kuma cikakke ga duk masu amfani.
frontend_featuresFree_List05.original: Code is open source and fully available to all users.

frontend_featuresFree_List06.message: Yi amfani da gwargwadon abin da kuke so ba tare da farashi ba.
frontend_featuresFree_List06.original: Use as much as you want at no cost.

frontend_featuresPremium_List01.message: Zaɓi muryar da kuka fi so don kowane harshe.
frontend_featuresPremium_List01.original: Choose your own preferred voice for each language.

frontend_featuresPremium_List02.message: Daidaita saurin karantawa da sauti kowane murya.
frontend_featuresPremium_List02.original: Adjust reading speed and pitch per voice.

frontend_featuresPremium_List03.message: Wannan ɗumi mai ɗumi mai ban sha'awa da kuke samu lokacin tallafawa buɗaɗɗen software ta masu haɓakawa masu zaman kansu.
frontend_featuresPremium_List03.original: That warm, fuzzy feeling you get when supporting open source software by independent developers.

frontend_featuresPremium_List04.message: Premium haɗa sabuntawa na gaba Premium ba tare da ƙarin farashi ba.
frontend_featuresPremium_List04.original: Future Premium updates included without additional cost.

frontend_featuresPremium_List05.message: Yi magana da rubutu daga allo. Kwafi kowane rubutu daga ko'ina a cikin kowane shiri, kuma yi amfani da Talkie Premium don karanta shi.
frontend_featuresPremium_List05.original: Speak text from the clipboard. Copy any text from anywhere in any program, and use Talkie Premium to read it.

frontend_installVoicesNoVoiceFound.message: Ba a iya samun muryoyin rubutu-zuwa-magana ba. Ba tare da muryoyin Talkie ba za su iya aiki daidai. Wani lokaci yana taimakawa wajen sake loda wannan shafin, aƙalla idan mai binciken yana jinkiri ko kuma akwai muryoyi da yawa.
frontend_installVoicesNoVoiceFound.original: Could not find any text-to-speech voices. Without voices Talkie can not function correctly. Sometimes it helps to reload this page, at least if the browser is slow or there are many voices.

frontend_installVoicesNoVoiceFoundHeadin.message: Ba a sami muryoyin rubutu-zuwa-magana ba

frontend_licenseCLADescription.message: Duk gudummawar zuwa Talkie ana yin su ƙarƙashin Yarjejeniyar Lasisi Mai Ba da Gudunmawa (CLA).
frontend_licenseCLADescription.original: All contributions to Talkie are made under the Contributor License Agreement (CLA).

frontend_settingsReadClipboardPermission.message: Ba a ba da damar shiga allo ba.

Don yin magana da rubutu daga kowane shiri, zaku iya kwafin rubutu zuwa allo kuma yi amfani da gajeriyar hanyar madannai mai daidaitawa. Don Talkie don samun damar allo kuna buƙatar ba da izini da farko. Wannan sifa ce ta Talkie Premium .
frontend_settingsReadClipboardPermission.original: To speak text from any program, you can copy text to the clipboard and use the configurable keyboard shortcut. For Talkie to access the clipboard you need to grant permission first. This is a Talkie Premium feature.

frontend_settingsReadClipboardPermission.message: Bada ko ƙin izinin ku kowane lokaci. Mai burauzan ku na iya ko bazai tambaye ku don tabbatarwa ba.
frontend_settingsReadClipboardPermission.original: Grant or deny your permission any time. Your browser may or may not ask you to confirm.

frontend_settingsReadClipboardPermission.message: An ba da damar shiga allo.
Samun damar allo wanda ba a sani ba ko gazawa.

frontend_settingsReadClipboardTextCouldN.message: Ba a iya karanta rubutun allo ba.
frontend_settingsReadClipboardTextCouldN.original: Clipboard text could not be read.

frontend_settingsReadClipboardTextNotYet.message: Ba a karanta rubutun allo ba.
frontend_settingsReadClipboardTextNotYet.original: Clipboard text has not been read.

frontend_storyDescription.message: Talkie kwanaki kaɗan kafin Sabuwar Shekara ta 2016/2017, akan ƙalubale daga aboki. Kalubalen ya fara ne da tambayar: yayin da muke tafiya zuwa aiki, shin zai yiwu a saurari labarin maimakon karanta shi? Da sauƙi, na ce, kuma na tashi don tabbatar da shi — ko aƙalla don sa mai bincike na ya yi magana da rubutu ta amfani da muryar kwamfuta wauta. Buga na asali, ba tare da kowane mai amfani ba, ya zama abin ƙirƙira maras muhimmanci. Ƙara ƙirar mai amfani, ya ɗauki ɗan lokaci kaɗan. Ƙara ingantaccen gano harshe gungun ƙarin lamba. Cin nasara akan kwari a cikin mai binciken yana da ƙarin aiki. Jerin abubuwan haɓakawa da fasali yana ci gaba — kuma ƴan layukan lamba dubu kaɗan daga baya, kuna kallon ƙarshen sakamakon.
frontend_storyDescription.original: Talkie was developed a few days before the New Year 2016/2017, on a challenge from a friend. The challenge started with the question: while commuting to work, is it possible to listen to an article instead of reading it? Easy, I said, and set out to prove it — or at least to make my browser speak out text using a silly computer voice. The basic edition, without any user interface, turned out to be trivial to create. Adding a user interface, took a bit longer. Adding proper language detection a bunch more code. Overcoming bugs in the browser even more work. The list of improvements and features goes on — and a few thousand lines of code later, you're looking at the end result.

frontend_storyThankYou.message: Na gode don amfani da Talkie — idan kuna so, gaya wa abokan ku!
frontend_storyThankYou.original: Thank you for using Talkie — if you like it, tell your friends!

frontend_supportDescription.message: Don tallafi mai sauri da sauƙi, da fatan za a duba ta waɗannan tambayoyin gama-gari da amsoshi. Idan har yanzu ba a amsa tambayarka ba, da fatan za a tuntube ni.
frontend_supportDescription.original: For quick and easy support, please look through these common questions and answers. If your question is still not answered, please contact me.

frontend_upgradeExplanation01.message: Ba a kayyade farashin Talkie Premium Madadin haka kuna ba da gudummawar abin da kuke so, ya danganta da nawa kuke tunanin fasalulluka masu ƙima a gare ku. Kuna iya yanke shawarar ba da gudummawar komai.
frontend_upgradeExplanation01.original: The price for Talkie Premium is not fixed. Instead you donate what you want, depending on how much you think the premium features are worth to you. You can even decide to donate nothing.

frontend_upgradeExplanation02.message: Bayan bayar da gudummawa babu lambobin haɓakawa da za a shigar, babu asusun mai amfani da za a yi rajista, ko wata tabbacin gudummawar da ke wurin. Madadin haka Talkie Premium yana amfani da tsarin girmamawa.
frontend_upgradeExplanation02.original: After donating there are no upgrade codes to enter, no user accounts to register, or any other donation verification in place. Instead Talkie Premium uses the honor system.

frontend_upgradeExplanation03.message: Talkie bashi da wani talla, bin diddigin mai amfani, ko tattara bayanai azaman madadin hanyoyin samun kuɗi. Ana lakafta gudummawar a matsayin kyauta don haɓaka software na buɗe tushen.
frontend_upgradeExplanation03.original: Talkie does not have any advertising, user tracking, or data collection as alternate means of monetization. Donations are labeled as gratuity for open source software development.

frontend_upgradePaymentPrimaryLinkText.message: Ba da gudummawa ta amfani da PayPal

frontend_usageSelectionContextMenuDescri.message: Hakanan zaka iya zaɓar rubutun, sannan danna kan shi dama, sannan zaɓi Talkie a cikin menu. Wannan hanyar kuma tana aiki a cikin fayilolin PDF da wasu nau'ikan shafuka na musamman a cikin mai binciken.
frontend_usageSelectionContextMenuDescri.original: You can also select the text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. This way also works in PDF-files and some special types of pages in the browser.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative03.message: Waɗannan su ne maɓallan gajerun hanyoyin da aka ba da shawarar, waɗanda za a iya canza su daga shafin saitin kari na burauzar ku.
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative03.original: These are the suggested shortcut keys, which can be changed from the extension settings page of your browser.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative04.message: Ya zama ruwan dare cewa akwai sabani tsakanin gajerun hanyoyin keyboard na kari da shirye-shirye daban-daban. Idan maɓallin gajeriyar hanya ba ta aiki, da fatan ba a riga an saita shi don wani abu dabam ba.
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative04.original: It is common that there are conflicts between the keyboard shortcuts of different extensions and programs. If a shortcut key does not work, please make sure that it is not already configured for something else.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative05.message: Duba ko canza Talkie gajeriyar hanya Talkie.
frontend_usageShortcutKeyAlternative05.original: Check or change the Talkie shortcut keys.

frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescription.message: Zaɓin da ya dace shine amfani da Talkie gajeriyar hanya Talkie:
frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescription.original: A convenient option is to use the Talkie shortcut keys:

frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescriptionSpea.message: Yi magana da rubutu kai tsaye daga allon allo
frontend_usageShortcutKeyDescriptionSpea.original: Speak text directly from the clipboard

frontend_usageSpeakFromClipboard.message: Yi magana da kowane rubutu da aka kwafe zuwa allon allo, ta amfani da daidaitawar muryoyinku. Hanya mafi sauƙi ita ce amfani da maɓallin gajeriyar hanya mai daidaitawa. Hakanan zaka iya danna dama akan maɓallin Talkie Premium , ko a cikin wani yanki mara komai na gidan yanar gizo, sannan zaɓi magana daga allo.
frontend_usageSpeakFromClipboard.original: Speak any text copied to your clipboard, using your configured voices. The easiest way is to use a configurable shortcut key. You can also right-click on the Talkie Premium button, or in an empty area of a website, and select speak from clipboard.

frontend_usageStep01.message: Zaɓi rubutun da ake so akan kowane shafin yanar gizon.
frontend_usageStep01.original: Select desired text on any web page.

frontend_usageStep02.message: Danna Talkie a cikin kayan aikin burauzan ku
frontend_usageStep02.original: Click the Talkie button in your browser toolbar

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabExplanation0.message: Ana iya amfani da Talkie don karanta zaɓaɓɓen rubutun akan shafi. Lokacin da shafin ke rufe ko adireshin shafin ya canza, Talkie na iya ci gaba da magana ko kuma ta tsaya ta atomatik.
frontend_voicesContinueOnTabExplanation0.original: Talkie can be used to read the selected text on a page. When the page is closed or the page address changes, Talkie can either continue speaking or automatically stop.

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabHeading.message: Ci gaba da magana ko tsayawa ta atomatik

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabRemovedExpla.message: Lokacin da aka rufe shafin ko taga, Talkie na iya ci gaba da magana ko kuma ta tsaya ta atomatik.
frontend_voicesContinueOnTabRemovedExpla.original: When the tab or window is closed, Talkie can either continue speaking or automatically stop.

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabRemovedLabel.message: Ci gaba da magana lokacin da aka rufe shafin
frontend_voicesContinueOnTabRemovedLabel.original: Continue speaking when the tab is closed

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlEx.message: Canje-canjen adireshi yana faruwa ne da farko lokacin danna hanyar haɗi don zuwa wani shafi, ko lokacin da ake buga adireshin da hannu. Wasu gidajen yanar gizo na iya canza adireshin a wasu lokuta, misali lokacin loda ƙarin bayani.
frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlEx.original: Address changes happen primarily when clicking a link to go to another page, or when manually typing in the address bar. Certain websites may also change the address in other cases, for example when loading additional information.

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlEx.message: Lokacin da adireshin shafin ya canza, Talkie na iya ci gaba da magana ko kuma ta tsaya ta atomatik.
frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlEx.original: When the page address changes, Talkie can either continue speaking or automatically stop.

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlFi.message: Don dalilai na sirri, Mozilla Firefox ba koyaushe yana ba da rahoto lokacin da adireshin shafin ya canza ba. Kashe wannan saitin bazai yi wani tasiri ba.
frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlFi.original: For privacy reasons, Mozilla Firefox does not always report when the page address changes. Disabling this setting may not have any effect.

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlHe.message: Lokacin da adireshin shafin ya canza

frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlLa.message: Ci gaba da magana lokacin da adireshin ya canza
frontend_voicesContinueOnTabUpdatedUrlLa.original: Continue speaking when the address changes

frontend_voicesDefaultVoiceForDialect.message: Muryar da aka saba don yaren $LANGUAGE_CODE$ shine $VOICE$ .
frontend_voicesDefaultVoiceForDialect.original: The default voice for the dialect $LANGUAGE_CODE$ is $VOICE$.

frontend_voicesDefaultVoiceForLanguage.original: The default voice for the language $LANGUAGE_GROUP$ is $VOICE$.

frontend_voicesDescription.message: Duba kuma gwada shigar da muryoyin don kowane harshe a cikin burauzar ku. Talkie Premium masu amfani kuma za su iya zaɓar muryar da suka fi so a matsayin tsoho a kowane harshe, tare da saita saurin gudu da sauti ga kowace murya.
frontend_voicesDescription.original: See and test installed voices for each language in your browser. Talkie Premium users can also select their favorite voice as the default per language, as well as set speed and pitch for each voice.

frontend_voicesListenToVoiceSample.description: The $VOICE$ the name of the voice
frontend_voicesListenToVoiceSample.original: Listen to a voice sample of $VOICE$.

frontend_voicesPitchEmptyHeading.description: The per-voice pitch options heading, without the voice name variable as none has been selected

frontend_voicesPitchHeading.description: The per-voice pitch options heading, including the voice name

frontend_voicesRateEmptyHeading.description: The per-voice speed options heading, without the voice name variable as none has been selected

frontend_voicesRateHeading.description: The per-voice speed options heading, including the voice name

frontend_voicesSampleText.description: The original sentence is a popuplar English pangram. Translators are encouraged to use pangrams in their own languages. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pangram
frontend_voicesSampleText.message: Da sauri mai launin ruwan kasa ta tsalle kan karen malalaci.
frontend_voicesSampleText.original: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageUseVoiceAsDe.description: The $LANGUAGE$ is the name (or ISO 639 code such as sv or sv-SE) of the language, the $VOICE$ the name of the voice
frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageUseVoiceAsDe.message: Yi amfani da $VOICE$ azaman tsohuwar murya don rubutu a cikin $LANGUAGE$
frontend_voicesSetAsLanguageUseVoiceAsDe.original: Use $VOICE$ as default voice for text in $LANGUAGE$

frontend_voicesShowAdditionalDetailsExpl.message: Don wargaza masarrafar mai amfani, ba a nuna wasu cikakkun bayanai ta tsohuwa. Idan kun kunna wannan zaɓi, za a nuna ƙarin bayani.
frontend_voicesShowAdditionalDetailsExpl.original: To unclutter the user interface, some details are not shown by default. If you enable this option, additional information will be shown.

frontend_voicesShowAdditionalDetailsExpl.message: Wannan ya haɗa da bayanan goyan baya don wasu masu bincike da tsarin aiki.
frontend_voicesShowAdditionalDetailsExpl.original: This includes support information for other browsers and operating systems.

frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsExplanation.message: A wasu masu bincike, ba zai yiwu a ci gaba da karanta dogon rubutu ba. Don yin aiki a kusa da wannan, Talkie gabatar da ɗan ɗan dakata tsakanin jimloli/fasaloli da kuma bayan sauran alamun rubutu.
frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsExplanation.original: In some browsers, it is not possible to read long texts continuously. To work around this, Talkie introduces a small pause between sentences/clauses and after other punctuation.

frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsExplanation.message: Idan kun kunna wannan zaɓi kuma karanta dogayen rubutu yana tsayawa bayan daƙiƙa 10-20, da fatan za a sake kashe shi.
frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsExplanation.original: If you enable this option and reading long texts stops after 10-20 seconds, please disable it again.

frontend_voicesSpeakLongTextsLabel.message: Karanta dogon rubutu ba tare da tsayawa ba (gwaji)

frontend_voicesSpeakingHistoryForgetAllH.message: Manta da shigarwar tarihin mutum ɗaya

frontend_voicesSpeakingHistoryLimitExpla.message: Talkie na iya tunawa da rubutun da aka yi magana a baya, don haka za'a iya sake kunna shi daga baya. Wannan saitin yana iyakance adadin shigarwar tarihi da ake tunawa.
frontend_voicesSpeakingHistoryLimitExpla.original: Talkie can remember previously spoken text, so it can be replayed later. This setting limits how many history entries are remembered.

frontend_voicesSpeakingHistoryLimitExpla.message: Rage iyaka don rage adadin shigarwar tarihi nan take. Iyakar 0 yana hana tunawa da tarihi. Matsakaicin iyaka shine $DEFAULT_LIMIT$ .
frontend_voicesSpeakingHistoryLimitExpla.original: Lower the limit to instantly reduce the number of history entries. A limit of 0 disables remembering the history. The default limit is $DEFAULT_LIMIT$.

frontend_voicesSpeakingHistoryLimitExpla.message: A halin yanzu ana tunawa da shigarwar tarihin $HISTORY_COUNT$. Kuna iya mantawa gaba ɗaya, ko manta abubuwan shigarwa ɗaya.
frontend_voicesSpeakingHistoryLimitExpla.original: There are currently $HISTORY_COUNT$ history entries remembered. You can forget all at once, or forget individual entries.

frontend_voicesTalkiePremiumPitch.message: Tare da Talkie Premium zaku iya canza tsohuwar murya don kowane harshe, da murya da sautin kowane murya.
frontend_voicesTalkiePremiumPitch.original: With Talkie Premium you can change the default voice for each language, as well as voice and pitch for each voice.

frontend_voicesVoiceIsOnline.message: $VOICE$ muryar kan layi ce. Amfani na iya buƙatar haɗin intanet mai aiki don samun damar sabis na ɓangare na uku.
frontend_voicesVoiceIsOnline.original: $VOICE$ is an online voice. Usage may require an active internet connection to access third-party services.

frontend_welcomeHero01.message: Barka da zuwa $NAME$! Yanzu kuna amfani da ɗayan mafi kyawun kari na rubutu-zuwa-magana a cikin duniya.
frontend_welcomeHero01.original: Welcome to $NAME$! You are now using one of the best text-to-speech browser extensions in the world.

frontend_welcomeHero02.message: Zaɓi wannan rubutun, sannan danna maɓallin $NAME$ a cikin kayan aikin burauza.
frontend_welcomeHero02.original: Select this text, then click the $NAME$ button in the browser toolbar.

frontend_welcomeInstallMoreVoicesDescrip.message: A halin yanzu Talkie na iya samun $VOICES_COUNT$ muryoyin da aka shigar, suna ba da damar $LANGUAGE_GROUPS_COUNT$ harsuna a cikin yarukan $LANGUAGES_COUNT$ .
frontend_welcomeInstallMoreVoicesDescrip.original: Talkie can currently find $VOICES_COUNT$ voices installed, enabling $LANGUAGE_GROUPS_COUNT$ languages in $LANGUAGES_COUNT$ dialects.

noTextSelectedMessage.message: Da fatan za a fara zaɓar rubutun da ake so akan gidan yanar gizon. Hakanan zaka iya zaɓar rubutu, sannan danna dama Talkie , sannan zaɓi Talkie a cikin menu.
noTextSelectedMessage.original: Please select desired text on the website first. You can also select text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu.

notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.description: Some tabs can't be accessed by WebExtensions, such as chrome:// and the Chrome Web Store/Firefox Add-ons. This message warns users.
notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.message: Talkie zai iya samun damar zaɓin rubutun daga wannan nau'in shafin ba. Shafi ne na musamman, kuma akwai iyakokin tsaro da mai binciken ya sanya a ciki. Hakanan zaka iya ƙoƙarin zaɓar rubutu, sannan danna kan shi dama, sannan zaɓi Talkie a cikin menu. Yi hakuri da rashin jin dadi.
notAbleToSpeakTextFromThisSpecialTab.original: Talkie cannot access the selected text from this type of page. It is a very special page, and there are security limitations put in by the browser. You can also try to select text, then right click on it, and choose Talkie in the menu. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

readClipboardIsAPremiumFeature.message: Yi hakuri, amma magana da rubutu daga allon allo fasalin Talkie Premium ne. Shin kun yi tunanin haɓakawa?
readClipboardIsAPremiumFeature.original: I'm sorry, but speaking text from the clipboard is a Talkie Premium feature. Have you considered upgrading?

readClipboardNeedsBrowserSupport.message: Yi hakuri, amma da alama wannan burauzar ba ta goyan bayan shiga allon allo.
readClipboardNeedsBrowserSupport.original: I'm sorry, but this browser does not seem to support accessing the clipboard.

readClipboardNeedsPermission.message: Talkie bashi da izinin shiga allon allo. Kuna iya ba da izini akan shafin zaɓuɓɓukan Talkie .
readClipboardNeedsPermission.original: Talkie does not have permission to access the clipboard. You may grant permission on the Talkie options page.

readClipboardNoSuitableText.message: An kasa samun rubutun da ya dace a cikin allo. Za a iya gwada kwafa wani abu dabam?
readClipboardNoSuitableText.original: Could not find suitable text in the clipboard. Can you try copying something else?
